about_the_game:
Being a Penguin is a short and sweet exploration adventure about being or not being a penguin. Explore a beautiful frozen world and talk with other animals in order to figure out what makes them unique. Try to walk in their shoes and look at the world through their eyes. Bump and slide on frozen terrain in this physically based ragdoll game and enjoy the gorgeous views of the pinkish white frozen world!

Bree, the penguin who doesn't want to be a penguin, is:

  • Curious, excited and light-hearted
  • Very often late for penguin meetings
  • Always exploring and having fun
  • One of many other penguins living in this fictional animal world
  • Feeling like she doesn't belong
  • Eager to become someone else!

Play as Bree, a curious penguin who just wants to be someone else. She lives in a colony of hundreds other penguins. They have some things in common - she likes to eat fish, she loves watching the falling snow and she doesn't mind the cold just like her brothers and sisters. On the other hand, she hates water and swimming, loves doing silly things and just absolutely hates being a penguin. What if she could be a bear?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Being a Penguin is a story adventure about a penguin Bree who doesn't want to be a penguin! Bump and slide your way in a beautiful island and uncover all it's secrets. Talk with other animals and figure out how to become one of them. Featuring penguin physics and gorgeous flat art style!
